message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $13,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be worth more than that to you. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your perspective, but based on my needs and budget, I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. I appreciate your understanding and hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While $12,000 is a step in the right direction, I'm still aiming for a price that reflects the value of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,500.  This would allow us both to get a good deal. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. However, considering my budget constraints, I am unable to agree to $13,500. I would like to propose $12,500 as a fair compromise. I hope this meets somewhere in between our expectations.
